section.title: ALTER AGGREGATE
section.p: Changes the definition of an aggregate function

section.title: ALTER CONVERSION
section.p: Changes the definition of a conversion.

section.title: ALTER DATABASE
section.p: Changes the attributes of a database.

section.title: ALTER DOMAIN
section.p: Changes the definition of a domain.

section.title: ALTER EXTERNAL TABLE
section.p: Changes the definition of an external table.

section.title: ALTER FILESPACE
section.p: Changes the definition of a filespace.

section.title: ALTER FUNCTION
section.p: Changes the definition of a function.

section.title: ALTER GROUP
section.p: Changes a role name or membership.

section.title: ALTER INDEX
section.p: Changes the definition of an index.

section.title: ALTER LANGUAGE
section.p: Changes the name of a procedural language.

section.title: ALTER OPERATOR
section.p: Changes the definition of an operator.

section.title: ALTER OPERATOR CLASS
section.p: Changes the definition of an operator class.

section.title: ALTER PROTOCOL
section.p: Changes the definition of a protocol.

section.title: ALTER RESOURCE QUEUE
section.p: Changes the limits of a resource queue.

section.title: ALTER ROLE
section.p: Changes a database role (user or group).

section.title: ALTER SCHEMA
section.p: Changes the definition of a schema.

section.title: ALTER SEQUENCE
section.p: Changes the definition of a sequence generator.

section.title: ALTER TABLE
section.p: Changes the definition of a table.

section.title: ALTER TABLESPACE
section.p: Changes the definition of a tablespace.

section.title: ALTER TRIGGER
section.p: Changes the definition of a trigger.

section.title: ALTER TYPE
section.p: Changes the definition of a data type.

section.title: ALTER USER
section.p: Changes the definition of a database role (user).

section.title: CLUSTER
section.p: Physically reorders a heap storage table on disk according to an index. Not a recommended operation in Greenplum Database.

section.title: COMMENT
section.p: Defines or change the comment of an object.

section.title: COPY
section.p: Copies data between a file and a table.

section.title: CREATE ROLE
section.p: Defines a new database role (user or group).

section.title: CREATE TABLE AS
section.p: Defines a new table from the results of a query.

section.title: CREATE TRIGGER
section.p: Defines a new trigger. User-defined triggers are not supported in Greenplum Database.

section.title: CREATE USER
section.p: Defines a new database role with the LOGIN privilege by default.

section.title: DROP OWNED
section.p: Removes database objects owned by a database role.

section.title: EXPLAIN
section.p: Shows the query plan of a statement.

section.title: FETCH
section.p: Retrieves rows from a query using a cursor.
section.i: where forward_direction can be empty or one of:

section.title: INSERT
section.p: Creates new rows in a table.

section.title: LOAD
section.p: Loads or reloads a shared library file.

section.title: MOVE
section.i: where direction can be empty or one of:

section.title: REASSIGN OWNED
section.p: Changes the ownership of database objects owned by a database role.

section.title: RESET
section.p: Restores the value of a system configuration parameter to the default value.

section.title: ROLLBACK TO SAVEPOINT
section.p: Rolls back the current transaction to a savepoint.

section.title: SAVEPOINT
section.p: Defines a new savepoint within the current transaction.

section.title: SELECT
section.p: Retrieves rows from a table or view.

section.title: SELECT INTO
section.p: Defines a new table from the results of a query.

section.title: SET
section.p: Changes the value of a Greenplum Database configuration parameter.

section.title: SET ROLE
section.p: Sets the current role identifier of the current session.

section.title: SET SESSION AUTHORIZATION
section.p: Sets the session role identifier and the current role identifier of the current session.

section.title: SET TRANSACTION
section.p: Sets the characteristics of the current transaction.

section.title: SHOW
section.p: Shows the value of a system configuration parameter.

section.title: TRUNCATE
section.p: Empties a table of all rows.

section.title: VACUUM
section.p: Garbage-collects and optionally analyzes a database.
